title: XRP lawyer runs again for US Senate seat in 2026
summary: John Deaton’s campaign announcement primarily focused on his background and cost-of-living issues, but he spoke about digital assets during his 2024 run for the US Senate.

title: ClearToken gets FCA nod for crypto settlement platform amid UK rules push
summary: ClearToken won FCA approval for a regulated crypto settlement system, signaling the UK’s push to bring digital assets under its financial framework.

title: SOL traders’ every wish came true — except for new all-time highs: What gives?
summary: Solana’s fundamentals remain strong, but its recovery toward $250 will depend on easing geopolitical risks and renewed confidence in tech markets.

title: VCI Global unveils crypto treasury plan, backs Tether’s payments arm OOBIT
summary: The Nasdaq-listed company will acquire $100 million in OOB tokens and oversee the digital treasury of OOBIT, a crypto payments company backed by Tether and Solana’s co-founder.

title: Ethereum’s $200B tokenized asset base backs analysts’ calls for higher ETH price
summary: Ethereum’s $200 billion tokenized economy, falling exchange supply, and traditional finance footprint are fundamental factors that suggest ETH’s price is undervalued.

title: Senate approves funding bill to reopen US gov’t, awaits vote in House
summary: Some agencies, such as the SEC, are expected to reopen the day after a funding bill becomes law, more than 40 days after reducing their operations and staff.

title: Major fantasy sports operator enters prediction markets with Polymarket
summary: PrizePicks has teamed up with Polymarket to let users wager on real-world outcomes, expanding beyond fantasy sports into the growing prediction-market space.

title: Dan Tapiero says Bitcoin’s bull run is still on, but a 70% downturn could follow
summary: Speaking with Cointelegraph, 10T Holdings founder Dan Tapiero explains why Bitcoin’s fundamentals remain strong even as a 70% downturn looms in the next bear phase.

title: Bitcoin price fills CME gap, but '$240M market dump' stops a $104K rebound
summary: Bitcoin dropped to fill its latest futures gap at the Wall Street open, but whale selling pressure kept a BTC price rebound off the menu.

title: Gifting Bitcoin in 2025: What the IRS says and how to avoid tax trouble
summary: Gifting Bitcoin isn’t taxable right away, but the IRS still has rules. Here’s how to stay compliant and prevent future tax problems.
